Class RectangleView

java.lang.Object
RectangleView
public class RectangleView extends Object
The view component of the MVC architecture for the rectangle drawing application. Provides the graphical user interface (GUI) for user interactions, including input fields, buttons for actions, a canvas for drawing rectangles, and a list display of added rectangles.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    RectangleView()
    Constructs a new RectangleView and initializes the GUI components.

  • Constructor Details

    • RectangleView

      public RectangleView()
      Constructs a new RectangleView and initializes the GUI components. The GUI includes:
      • A canvas panel for drawing rectangles.
      • Input fields for specifying rectangle properties.
      • Buttons for adding and resetting rectangles.
      • A display area for the list of added rectangles.
